channel.title: BoboPvP.com - [Dicing][PvPBased][NotSpawn][Korasi][Edge]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]BoboPvP.com ALL WE DO IS PK[/size] PICS: [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Background.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/Newitems.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/sealoffortuneandGS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/JoinToday.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1216.photobucket.com/albums/dd361/djzone24/DonorZone.png[/img] Webclient, Forums, Dl Client
[size=12pt]Start Here! - [url=http://www.bobopvp.com]http://www.bobopvp.com[/url]
RsWebclients Link(Not Recommended) - [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/info/BoboPvP]http://www.rswebclients.com/info/BoboPvP[/url]
Features: -Perfect Switching for Hybrids -Veng -Barrage -634 Graphics/Animations/Items -PvP Armor/Curses released -New F-Keys -Unique features -Stable Economy -No dupes -24/7 vps hosted -Constant Updates -Great Staff Team -634 graphics -Great Donator Benefits -Chaotic Weapons -Great Rushing System! -Full Drops AND RANDOM PvP Drops too! -Pking Level! -Clue Scrolls and great rewards! -Turmoil/Soul Split, with proper effects -Highscores System Interfaces! -100% drop party room -Spirit shields with proper effects, i.e: -Divine: Always reduces 30% of damage, taking 5% of the 30% from your -Prayer. -Elysian: 70% chance of reducing 25% damage taken. -Perfect xlogging fix -Duel arena -Pk leaderboards -Account recovery -Godwars bosses -Webclient -Unique donor system -Slayer points -Perfect revamped banking -Revamped PvP System -Perfect, revamped shopping -Perfect private messaging -All private chat options work properly -Pest control -Slayer points -All skillcape emotes work -Perfect combat -Amazing pking -Buy 50, sell 50 -No rollbacks -Pest control -Donator crown changing system -All skills are trainable -Pk points and pk point store. -All PvP Items and Armors. (Morrigans, Vesta, Statius, and Zuriels) -Overloads -Restore Special -Primal armour + weapons -Promethium Armor + weapons -Korasi's Sword -Hand cannon -Chaotic Shield -Dragon Defender[/size]
